citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:47 pm on 17 May
2021. Telephone and email contact was attempted, without response, and there was no response to ringing the doorbell.
A responsible adult must be available during business hours to accompany an inspector.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:47 pm on 17 May 
2021.  Telephone and email contact was attempted, without response, and there was no response to ringing the doorbell. 
A responsible adult must be available during business hours to accompany an inspector. 
 
 
 
End Section
